channel.title: Sunrise Church

item.title: Episode 2
item.description: This is where 'show notes" go if any. A brief synopsis of the 'episode' is already in the summary (visable in iTunes or other app) so here would be more extended writing to be displayed on the podcast website itself. Totally optional.
